page.title: 12Shopping Precinct in Cwmbran
page.content:
At Greenwillows Shopping Precinct there are six shops employing about 15 staff. These are a grocer, a butcher, a green-grocer and newsagent with a post-office,a general store and a hair-dressers. There has been a wool shop, pet shop and a chemist. People find these local shops very convenient and enjoy the personal service. The majority go daily for small items of food and newspapers. The most busy days are Tuesday and{ Thursday when pensions and allowances are paid and Saturday when people are home from work. Some people would like to have a fish and chip shop, others a dispensing chemist, here as well.
Written after a survey by: Sarah,Tracy,Wendy & Carla (Oakfield)
